name: Hangman (itch) (Herdoza Studio)
description:
In the hangman, also known as "hung", you will have to guess a secret word by choosing the letters that you think may be included in it.

You will win the game if you can guess the secret word before the figure of the stick man is completed. If not, it will be hanged and the game will be finalized.

In this Free English Hangman game you will find:

-Hundreds of words to find
-Different categories of words
-Hangman graphics very similar to those of the school
-Game for all ages, from children to the elderly or senior
-Practice your language and vocabulary skills
-Completely hangman free
-Available in different languages

You will enjoy many hours of fun with the Hangman in English. If you liked it, vote with +5!
